qas.question: When was Nanjing re-established as the capital of the Republic of China?
What party established Nanjing as the capital of the Republic of China?
Who was the leader of the Kuomintang (KMT; Nationalist Party)?
What are the 1930's known as, in China?
When did the Kuomintang (KMT; Nationalist Party) defeat and take over Beijing?

context: In <a0_0>1927<a0_0/>, <a1_0>the Kuomintang (KMT; Nationalist Party)<a1_0/> under <a2_0>Generalissimo Chiang Kai-shek<a2_0/> again established Nanjing as the capital of the Republic of China, and this became internationally recognized once KMT forces took Beijing in <a4_0>1928<a4_0/>. The following decade is known as <a3_0>the Nanking decade<a3_0/>.
